name: Harry Potter Text Adventure
tagline: Text adventure version of Harry Potter - made in inform 7.
body:
This is the first chapter for my Harry Potter text adventure. I would like to note that this is not approved by J.K. Rowling or Warner Bros. I just like Harry Potter, and I like programming. This game was made with Inform 7.

To play the game online, click here:
                                    [Play the game](https://rawgithub.com/ojzcroc/HPIF/master/Projects/Harry%20Potter%20and%20the%20Philosopher%27s%20stone%20Ch1%20Materials/Release/play.html)

To download the game, click here:
                                   [Download the game](https://github.com/ojzcroc/HPIF/raw/master/Projects/Harry%20Potter%20and%20the%20Philosopher%27s%20stone%20Ch1%20Materials/Release/Harry%20Potter%20and%20the%20Philosophe.gblorb)

To play the download, you need a glulx interpreter (although you don't need it to play online):
                                        
[Glulxe](http://www.eblong.com/zarf/glulx/)
                                        
[Gargoyle](http://ccxvii.net/gargoyle/)
